pullRequest.title: Add join pushdown predicate at the end of the exisiting predicate
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently, we add the join pushdown predicate at the start of the existing predicate, this will result in the evaluation of that without respecting the order of the existing ones.
Fixes #14065
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

commit.message: Add join pushdown predicate at the end of the exisiting predicate
